info.title: JABC
info.description:
This API provides all the functions needed to manage 
the JABC HR system.

securityAuthToken.name: X-Auth-Token
securityAuthToken.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

term.name: term
term.description: Search term for filter the data

tags.name: Employee
tags.description:
Provides access to all employee data and history, manage Performances of employees,
Vacations and Documents for the onboarding process

tags.name: Reports
tags.description: Provides functions to generate and export reports

tags.name: Roles
tags.description: Allows the customization of the employee roles

tags.name: Onboarding
tags.description: Manage the onboarding process of new employees

tags.name: Vacation
tags.description: Manage the vacation requests from employees

get.description:
This returns all the Employees of the system. 
If [start] and [end] are provided, it will return all employees with a birthday between those dates
If [term] is provided this returns the Employees of the system that match with the [term].

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Search employees with a birthday after this date, if this isn't provided there won't be any filtering

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Search employees with a birthday before this date, if this isn't provided there won't be any filtering

post.description: Will create a new Employee with the provided data in body

get.description: Will return the Employee that matches with the provided [id]

put.description: Will update an Employee with the provided data in body if the Employee matches the [id]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Employee to be updated

delete.description: Will delete (deactivate) an Employee if the Employee matches the [id]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Employee to be deleted

get.summary: get all the Managers of an employee with the provided [id]
get.description: This returns all the Employees of the system that manage the employee with the [id].

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Employee with the searched Managers

post.description: Sets the employee with [id] to be managed by the employee with [idManager]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Employee to be managed by another

parameters.name: idManager
parameters.description: Employee that will manage the employee with [id]

delete.description: Deletes the relation between employee with [id] and the employee with [idManager]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Employee to be unmanaged by another

parameters.name: idManager
parameters.description: Employee that will stop managing the employee with [id]

get.summary: get all the Employees that are managed by employee with [idManager]
get.description: This returns all the Employees that are managed by employee with [idManager].

parameters.name: idManager
parameters.description: Employee that will manage the employee with [id]

get.summary: get all the history of the employee with [id]
get.description: This returns all the history data of the employee with [id].

get.summary: get all the OnboardingTasks of the employee with [id]
get.description:
This returns all the OnboardingTasks of the system. 
If [term] is provided this returns the OnboardingTasks of the Employee that match with the [term].

post.summary: creates a new OnboardingTask for the employee with [id]
post.description: Will create a new OnboardingTask with the provided data in body

put.summary: completes the OnboardingTask with [idOnboardingTask] for the employee with [id]
put.description:
If the OnboardingTask requires a document to be completed, then the parameter [document] must be
provided to successfully complete the OnboardingTask.

parameters.name: idOnboardingTask
parameters.description: id of the OnboardingTask to be completed

parameters.name: document
parameters.description: The document file filled by the employee.

get.summary: get all the PerformancePlans of the employee with [id]
get.description:
This returns all the PerformancePlans of the system.
If [term] is provided this returns the PerformancePlans of the Employee that match with the [term].

post.summary: creates a new PerformancePlan for the employee with [id]
post.description: Will create a new PerformancePlan with the provided data in body

get.summary: get all the PerformanceReviews of the employee with [id]
get.description:
This returns all the PerformanceReviews of the system.
If [term] is provided this returns the PerformanceReviews of the Employee that match with the [term].

post.summary: creates a new PerformanceReview for the employee with [id]
post.description: Will create a new PerformanceReview with the provided data in body

get.summary: get all the Vacations of the employee with [id]
get.description:
This returns all the Vacations of the system. 
If [term] is provided this returns the Vacations of the Employee that match with the [term].

post.summary: creates a new Vacation for the employee with [id]
post.description: Will create a new Vacation with the provided data in body

post.summary: sign in the employee into the system

get.description:
Will return the Vacation that matches with the provided [id] from 
the Employee with [id]

put.description:
Will update an Vacation with the provided data in body 
if the Vacation matches the [id]

delete.description:
Will delete the Vacation that matches with the provided [id] from 
the Employee with [id]

get.description:
Will return all the OnboardingTasks on the system.
If [start] and [end] are provided, it will return all OnboardingTasks with a due date between those dates
If [status] is provided, it will return the onboarding tasks that matches that status (0:active, 1:done)

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Search onboarding tasks with a due date after this date, if this isn't provided there won't be any filtering

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Search onboarding tasks with a due date before this date, if this isn't provided there won't be any filtering

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: If provided will return the onboarding tasks that matches that status (0:active, 1:done)

get.description:
Will return the OnboardingTask that matches with the provided [id] from 
the Employee with [id]

put.description:
Will update an OnboardingTask with the provided data in body 
if the OnboardingTask matches the [id]

delete.description:
Will delete the OnboardingTask that matches with the provided [id] from 
the Employee with [id]

get.description: Will return the OnboardingTask File that matches with the provided [id]

200.description: The API responds with a file

get.description: This returns all the DocumentTypes of the system.

post.description: Will create a new DocumentType with the provided data in body

get.description: Will return the DocumentType that matches with the provided [id]

post.summary: uploads the template to the DocumentType
post.description: Will update an DocumentType with the provided file as a template if the DocumentType matches the [id]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the DocumentType to be updated

parameters.name: document
parameters.description: The document file to be used as a template

put.description: Will update an DocumentType with the provided data in body if the DocumentType matches the [id]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the DocumentType to be updated

delete.description: Will delete an DocumentType if the DocumentType matches the [id]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the DocumentType to be deleted

get.description: Will return the DocumentType File that matches with the provided [id]

200.description: The API responds with a file

get.description: This returns all the FAQs of the system.

post.description: Will create a new FAQ with the provided data in body

get.description: Will return the FAQ that matches with the provided [id]

put.description: Will update an FAQ with the provided data in body if the FAQ matches the [id]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the FAQ to be updated

delete.description: Will delete an FAQ if the FAQ matches the [id]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the FAQ to be deleted

get.description:
Will return the PerformancePlan that matches with the provided [id] from 
the Employee with [id]

put.description:
Will update an PerformancePlan with the provided data in body 
if the PerformancePlan matches the [id]

delete.description:
Will delete the PerformancePlan that matches with the provided [id] from 
the Employee with [id]

get.description:
Will return the PerformanceReview that matches with the provided [id] from 
the Employee with [id]

put.description:
Will update an PerformanceReview with the provided data in body 
if the PerformanceReview matches the [id]

delete.description:
Will delete the PerformanceReview that matches with the provided [id] from 
the Employee with [id]

get.summary: get all the Comments from a PerformanceReview with [id]
get.description: This returns all the Comments of the PerformanceReview with [id].

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the PerformanceReview with comments

post.summary: creates a new Comment for the PerformanceReview with [id]
post.description: Will create a new Comment with the provided data in body, to the PerformanceReview with [id]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the PerformanceReview to be commented

get.description: Will return the Comment that matches with the provided [idComment]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the PerformanceReview with comments

put.description: Will update an Comment with the provided data in body if the Comment matches the [idComment]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the PerformanceReview with comments

parameters.name: idComment
parameters.description: idComment of the Comment to be updated

delete.description: Will delete an Comment if the Comment matches the [idComment]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the PerformanceReview with comments

parameters.name: idComment
parameters.description: idComment of the Comment to be deleted

get.description: This returns all the Roles of the system.

post.description: Will create a new Role with the provided data in body

get.description: Will return the Role that matches with the provided [id]

put.description: Will update an Role with the provided data in body if the Role matches the [id]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Role to be updated

delete.description: Will delete an Role if the Role matches the [id]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Role to be deleted

get.description: This returns all the Competencys of the system.

parameters.name: idRole
parameters.description: id of the Role with searched Competency

post.description: Will create a new Competency with the provided data in body

parameters.name: idRole
parameters.description: id of the Role with searched Competency

get.description: Will return the Competency that matches with the provided [id]

parameters.name: idRole
parameters.description: id of the Role with searched Competency

put.description: Will update an Competency with the provided data in body if the Competency matches the [id]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Competency to be updated

parameters.name: idRole
parameters.description: id of the Role with searched Competency

delete.description: Will delete an Competency if the Competency matches the [id]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Competency to be deleted

parameters.name: idRole
parameters.description: id of the Role with searched Competency

IEmployee.description: An Employee contains all the current information of a current or onboarding employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the Employee

dateJoined.description: The date joined of the employee

vacationDays.description: The number of vacation days allowed to the employee per year

remainingVacationDays.description: The number of vacation days allowed to the employee on the current year

IEmployeeHistory.description: An Employee contains all the current information of a current or onboarding employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the Employee

version.description: The number of the version of the Employee data

fkCreator.description: The unique identifier of the Employee that updated the data of the Employee

createdDate.description: The date the creation of this version of the employee data

dateJoined.description: The date joined of the employee

vacationDays.description: The number of vacation days allowed to the employee per year

remainingVacationDays.description: The number of vacation days allowed to the employee on the current year

IRole.description: An Role is contains all the current information of a current or onboarding employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the Role

competencies.description: Contains all the competencies of this role

ICompetency.description: A Competency contains info of competencies and objectives that each role need to fulfill

id.description: The unique identifier of the Competency

IVacation.description: A Vacation contains info of the employee asking for a vaction period

id.description: The unique identifier of the Vacation

fkEmployee.description: The unique identifier of the Employee that requests the vacation

fkApprover.description: The unique identifier of the Employee that approves the vacation request

requestedDays.description: The number of vacation days the employee requested

date.description: The date when the employee requested the vacation

IOnboardingTask.description:
An onboarding task required for the onbarding proccess of a new Employee, if the property [requireDoc] is
set to 1, then the OnboardingTask require the employee to upload a document, and the fkDocumentType will 
contain the id of the IDocumentType object with the template of the document to be filled by the employee. 
Otherwise the [fkDocumentType] property will be null.

id.description: The unique identifier of the Role

fkDocumentType.description: The foreign key  of the DocumentType of this Document

fkEmployee.description: The foreign key  of the Employee that needs to upload this Document

createdDate.description: The created date of this Document

dueDate.description: The due date of this Document

requireDoc.description: Wether the Onboarding task requires document upload or not.

status.description: Wether the Onboarding task is done or not

expiryDate.description: The expiry date of this Document

file.description: The link to the file if it is required

IDocumentType.description: A DocumentType contains info of the template support document for the onboarding process

id.description: The unique identifier of the DocumentType

file.description: If the document has a template, this will be the link to access it

IPerformancePlan.description: PerformancePlan contains info of the sections of a performance plan of an employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the Performance

fkEmployee.description: Foreign key of the employee with this performance review

date.description: The date the performance review was created

sections.description: Contains all the IPerformanceSections Related to this IPerformancePlan

comments.description: Contains all the comments of this performance review

IPerformanceReview.description: PerformanceReview contains info of the sections of a performance plan of an employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the Performance

fkEmployee.description: Foreign key of the employee with this performance review

fkPerformancePlan.description: Foreign key of the performance plan

date.description: The date the performance review was created

sections.description: Contains all the IPerformanceSections Related to this IPerformanceReview

comments.description: Contains all the comments of this performance review

IPerformanceSection.description: A JSON object containing all the information of a section in either PerformancePlan or PerformanceReview

IComment.description: A Comment contains what another employee thinks about the performance record of another employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the Comment

fkPerformancePlan.description: Foreign key of PerformancePlan that has this Comment

fkPerformanceReview.description: Foreign key of PerformanceReview that has this Comment

fkCommenter.description: Foreign key of Employee that created the Comment

date.description: The date when the Comment was created

IFAQ.description: A FAQ contains a question and answer, to help the employee while onboarding

id.description: The unique identifier of the FAQ

ILogin.description: Represents the basic info to logged into the system

ILoginResponse.description: The data returned by the login path contains the employee info as well as the auth token
